DOC.brief_summary: In prospective , observational study investigator compare resistance value measure use airway perturbation device ( APD ) impulse oscillometry spirometry . The investigator also create reference equation normal APD resistance range use data clinically normal volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Airflow Perturbation Device ( APD ) Evaluation Pulmonary Sleep Disorders
DOC.criteria: Male female subject > 18 year Referred PFTs and/or PSG WRNMMC All race ethnicity include Pregnant woman include < 18 year age If mental status questionable , patient exclude discretion consent provider Unable/unwilling follow direction necessary APD use
